com.github.mrivanplays.event

Class TaskedEvent<T extends Event>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mrivanplays.event.Event
      • com.github.mrivanplays.event.TaskedEvent<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - event

    public abstract class TaskedEvent<T extends Event>
extends Event
    Represents a event, which listener is able to register tasks which be executed asynchronously after the event got fired. A BiConsumer is being required as a callback which is also ran after the event got fired. Take a look at the examples for usage

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TaskedEvent(java.util.function.BiConsumer<T,Throwable> callback)

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaskedEvent

        public TaskedEvent(java.util.function.BiConsumer<T,Throwable> callback)

    • Method Detail

      • addTask

        public final void addTask(java.util.function.Consumer<T> task)
        Adds a task to run after the event got fired. The task represents a consumer of the specified event. Event access is given only to access its getters, but not setters. As of the tasks being executed asynchronously, setting something inside the given value will not affect the event's values and the event handling itself.
        Parameters:
        task - the task to run

      • getTasks

        public final Set<java.util.function.Consumer<T>> getTasks()
        Returns a copy set of all registered tasks. If there are no tasks registered, then it will return empty set.
        Returns:
        copy of all tasks registered, or empty set

      • isCalled

        public final boolean isCalled()
        Returns whenever the event got called.
        Returns:
        true if event called, otherwise false

      • onEventCalled

        public void onEventCalled()
        Method which is being invoked when the event got called successfully. In this case, if there are any registered tasks, they get executed asynchronously, and then the callback gets executed. If error caught, the callback is being executed with the exception. It is not recommended to modify it in further implementations of the tasked event.
        Specified by:
        onEventCalled in class Event
